archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Single prompt
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
The single-prompt solutions include:
Few-shot prompting provides the model with examples before attempting a task. This allows it to learn from a small number of examples, usually less than 10 and the generalize to a new situation. This Meta-learning is considered an emergent property of LLM's. see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prompt_engineering or by adding explicit instruction such as "Let's think step-by-step" (i.e. zero-shot CoT prompting).https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.11916. LLMs are decent zero-shot reasoners by simply adding "Let's think step by step" before each answer.
